TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Vbc extends Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ManagedCompiler

Docs.summary: Implements the Vbc task. Use the Vbc element in your project file to create and execute this task. For usage and parameter information, see [Vbc Task](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/595278b1-2782-4577-b1ba-b4b5ab5625a3).

member this.DocumentationFile : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Turns on documentation comments processing and gets or sets the output documentation XML file.
Docs.value: The output documentation XML file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property overrides the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Vbc.GenerateDocumentation%2A> property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ErrorReport { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ErrorReport : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a string value that specifies how the task will report internal compiler errors.
Docs.value: A string value that specifies how the task will report internal compiler errors.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This property can have the following values:
- `prompt`
- `send`
- `none`
If `prompt` is specified and an internal compiler error occurs, the user is prompted with an option of whether to send the error data to Microsoft.
If `send` is specified and an internal compiler error occurs, the task sends the error data to Microsoft.
The default value is `none`, which reports errors in text output only.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void LogEventsFromTextOutput (string singleLine, Microsoft.Build.Framework.MessageImportance messageImportance);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void LogEventsFromTextOutput(string singleLine, valuetype Microsoft.Build.Framework.MessageImportance messageImportance) cil managed
protected: override void LogEventsFromTextOutput(System::String ^ singleLine, Microsoft::Build::Framework::MessageImportance messageImportance);

Docs.param: A single line captured from the STDOUT of the vbc compiler
The message importance: High,Low, or Normal
Docs.summary: This method intercepts the lines to be logged coming from STDOUT from VBC.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Once we see a standard vb warning or error, then we capture it and grab the next 3 lines so we can transform the string form the form of FileName.vb(line) to FileName.vb(line,column) which will allow us to report the line and column to the IDE, and thus filter the error in the duplicate case for multi-targeting, or just squiggle the appropriate token instead of the entire line.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ OptionCompare { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.OptionCompare : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a string value that specifies how string comparisons are made.
Docs.value: A string value that specifies how string comparisons are made.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This property can have the following values:
- `binary`
- `text`
The value `binary` specifies that the task uses binary string comparisons. The value `text` specifies that the task uses text string comparisons. The default value is `binary`.
